InventoryItem.description: Represents a physical stock item in the inventory.

id.description: Unique identifier for the item. Legacy ID was number, migration to UUID recommended.

name.description: The display name of the item. Mapped from legacy 'title'.

description.description: Detailed description of the item. Mapped from legacy 'body'.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit. Previously computed dynamically (STOCK-{index}), now persisted.

stockQuantity.description: Current quantity in stock. Previously random, now persisted.

ownerId.description: ID of the user who owns or created the item. Mapped from legacy 'userId'.

legacyMapping.notes: SKU and stockQuantity were transient in legacy. Needs database migration to persist these values.

UserSession.description: Represents the current authenticated user's session.

userId.description: The unique ID of the logged-in user.

isAuthenticated.description: Flag indicating if the session is active.

loginTime.description: Timestamp of when the user logged in.

ScanResult.description: Data captured from a barcode scan.

code.description: The raw string value scanned from the barcode.

format.description: The format of the barcode (e.g., QR_CODE, EAN_13).

ImageCapture.description: Image data captured from the device camera.

timestamp.description: Time when the photo was taken.
